Wetland observed to be on the trajectory of reaching pre-construction functional condition. Erosion rills observed along the long sloping stretch in this area (Plate 10, Appendix B). Issues continue for approximately 100 m. This issue is not near a watercourse so there is no risk of sedimentation, but should be repaired to avoid gully formations. This issue was repaired in January 2015.
